name: WGE (Worst Game Ever) ak square shooter
name_original: WGE (Worst Game Ever) ak square shooter
description:
The ultimate square shooter

Try out your skills in WGE, and see how far you can make it! Buy upgrades, but at the cost of your health. Do you want to stack up on upgrades, and try to dodge every bullet, or play it safe with only a few upgrades?

Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to jump, MOUSE to aim and shoot
